abstract: Sheriff Bobby Guidroz of St Landry Parish in Louisiana says Officer Henry Nelson was shot and killed by Harrison Lee Riley Jr in Sunset, La, after Nelson responded to report that three women had been stabbed; one woman, Shameka Johnson, died of injuries.
lead_paragraph: Officer Henry Nelson, 51, who responded to the call, was the second Louisiana police officer to be killed in four days.

headline.main: Police Officer Fatally Shot in Louisiana While Responding to Report of Stabbings
headline.print_headline: Police Officer Fatally Shot in Louisiana While Responding to Report of Stabbings

snippet: Officer Henry Nelson, 51, who responded to the call, was the second Louisiana police officer to be killed in four days.
